description: The underlying cause identified in this post revolves around the access issue within the Microsoft 365 admin center. Users must log in with their work accounts to gain proper access to the resources they require, specifically the ISO downloads and keys. Failure to do so may result in an inability to find necessary downloads, as they are located within specific sections of the admin interface, namely under billing and products in the left menu. This situation indicates potential miscommunication regarding user authentication and navigation within the admin center. It is essential for users to be aware of these navigation paths to avoid access issues to critical resources.
